description: Our store teams are the heart of Leap! We are looking for a driven Sales Supervisor for our Dolce Vita boutique on Melrose in Los Angeles. This leader will play an integral role in developing a world-class store team and delivering top-notch customer experience. The Leap platform launches and operates insight-driven retail stores for modern brands with better performance and less risk. Among the trailblazing brands we work with are: ASTR the Label, Frankies Bikinis, Malbon Golf, ThirdLove, True Classic Tees and many more.
responsibilities: Influence and inspire a team to create memorable in store experiences and foster a positive environment. Execute action plans in partnership with the Store Leader to drive sales and client engagement. Ensure store standards are maintained; cleanliness, visual merchandising and operational tasks (inventory counts, tagging, receiving + processing shipment). Support with activations and new store openings as needed. Embrace learning and leveraging new technologies, systems, apps, etc.; experience with Shopify, Endear, Slack, Google Office is a plus. Ability to operate independently and work effectively under pressure, support completion of store opening/closing procedures. Keep an agile work schedule; including days, nights, weekends, holidays. One or more years of direct and/or indirect management experience. Two or more years of retail experience; preferably in shoes or a similar category. Must be at least 18+ years of age. Maintain an active floor presence, including standing and walking for extended periods of time. Comfortability using a ladder and lifting a maximum of 50lbs.

qualifications.required: Must be at least 18+ years of age. One or more years of direct and/or indirect management experience. Two or more years of retail experience; preferably in shoes or a similar category.
qualifications.preferred: Experience with Shopify, Endear, Slack, Google Office is a plus.

benefits: Employee discount, Commission + Bonus Eligible, 401K, Accrued PTO for those eligible (blackout periods apply), Medical, Dental & Vision benefits (must avg 32hrs+/wk), Employee Assistance Program
